recipe.title: Oatmeal Banana Bread
recipe.comment: c/o How to Cook Smarter with cazzie tweaks
recipe.ingredient: 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, baking soda and cinnamon
recipe.step: Grease and line a baking dish, set aside.
Mix wet with ingredients and dry ingredients in seperate bowl.
Add wet ingredients to dry and stir well.
Pour milk bro prepared tray and cook for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown.
* make oat flour by placing oats in a blender and blend on high for 1-2 minutes.
